animeTitle: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama - Kamen Kokuhaku Taikai
animeDescription: A picture drama bonus included in a special DVD given to all who purchased a ticket for the film Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch I - Koudou over the course of the first six weeks of airing.
